summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 7, Block 1, Canal Addition, and Lots 1 to 9 inclusive, Block 1, Balch's Wedgwood Park Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-226 and 17-172, respectively.
